com.betfair.cougar.logging

Class CougarLogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.ErrorManager
      • com.betfair.cougar.logging.CougarLogManager

  • @ManagedResource
public class CougarLogManager
extends ErrorManager
    Keep a buffer of the last reported logging errors (ie. errors arising from logging, NOT application errors). Print some of them to Std err, but not all, as we don't want a flood. Once a second seems ok

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.util.logging.ErrorManager
